mapper.select: select o.id, o.order_at as orderTime, o.status, (select count(*) from order_item oi where oi.order_id=o.id) as count, (select name from product where id=(select product_id from order_item oi where oi.order_id=o.id and rownum=1)) as product_name from orders o where username=#{username}
select address, order_at, order_total_price from orders
